A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Some good things about the new Star Wars:

Visually it's great work! I can't remember that I have ever seen such poor story-telling look so good.
If you are able to turn off your brain except the region for visual satisfaction... this is your movie!

Another good thing about The last Jedi: It makes the prequels look like solid Star Wars-Artwork. 

Well\, and finally Jar Jar isn't the most unnecessary character in the Star Wars-Universe anymore! That's great!
We've got Purple Hair now! And Rose! And the Porgs!

Let's face it: Star Wars is dead...

It's STAR PORGS now!
